summary: Easily add ultimate health, magicka or stamina potions, or add more carryweight using this tome. Can also enable or disable godmode. Just a few quick cheats I frequently use.
descriptionHtml:
[u]Description[/u]

This mod adds a book to the player\'s inventory called \"The Tome of Lesser Cheating\". Activating it opens up a menu that lets you quickly acquire some potions of ultimate healing, magicka, or stamina.

There\'s also two non-item cheats for (a) increasing carry weight and (b) enabling/disabling \"god mode\".

This was mostly just a test project for modding using the creation kit. I use these cheats quite a bit and sometimes I don\'t want to or can\'t use or can\'t remember common console commands (and forget that there\'s a \"help\" :P). Maybe someone else will find it useful too.

[u] Installation [/u]

Extract the 7zip file and put \"Tome Of Lesser Cheating.esp\" into your Data folder.

[u] How it was made [/u]

It\'s nothing fancy. It\'s composed of:
-an in-game book
-a Papyrus script that runs when you open the book that throws up menus, from which you click what items or effects you\'d like.
-a dummy quest that runs once.
-the script attached to the dummy quest which adds the item to the player\'s inventory once the quest is initialized

[u] Source code [/u]

Available on request.
Also, you can easily see the scripts using the creation kit, and what specific quest and book were modified, but I guess details on what properties were modified in those are difficult to see via the creation kit.
author: archerkb
